Name: neonatal period electroclinical syndrome
Definition: An electroclinical syndrome with onset in the neonatal period less than 44 weeks of gestational age.

Name: infancy electroclinical syndrome
Definition: An electroclinical syndrome with onset in infancy occurring between birth and one year of age.

Name: variable age at onset electroclinical syndrome
Definition: An electroclinical syndrome with onset in adolescence and adulthood.

Name: obsolete nonsyndromic epilepsy
Definition: An electroclinical syndrome with onset in adolescence and adulthood.

Name: absence epilepsy
Definition: An electroclinical syndrome characterized by the occurrence of generalized onset seizures that cause lapses in awareness

Name: infantile or early childhood epileptic encephalopathy 2
Definition: An electroclinical syndrome characterized by onset of seizures in infancy or early childhood

Name: infantile or early childhood epileptic encephalopathy 1
Definition: An electroclinical syndrome characterized by onset of refractory multifocal seizures in the first weeks or years of life
